summary: A dataset class that assembles and preprocesses both instance-specific and class-wide images together with their textual prompts, converting images to the required format and tokenizing the prompts for use in model fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use data pipeline that streamlines the preparation of customized training data for DreamBooth‑style fine‑tuning of generative models, enabling businesses to quickly adapt models to new visual concepts.
